fields.name: DestinationAccount
fields.description: Required. Destination account name. It should be full resource id if allowCrossTenantReplication set to false.

fields.name: EnabledTime
fields.description: Indicates when the policy is enabled on the source account.

fields.name: PolicyId
fields.description: A unique id for object replication policy.

fields.name: Rules
fields.description: The storage account object replication rules.

fields.name: SourceAccount
fields.description: Required. Source account name. It should be full resource id if allowCrossTenantReplication set to false.
